name.description: The name of the client (string, required, unique in workspace)

wid.description: workspace ID, where the client will be used (integer, required)

notes.description: Notes for the client (string, not required)

hrate.description: The hourly rate for this client (float, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

cur.description: The name of the client's currency (string, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

name.description: The name of the client (string, required, unique in workspace)

wid.description: workspace ID, where the client will be used (integer, required)

notes.description: Notes for the client (string, not required)

hrate.description: The hourly rate for this client (float, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

cur.description: The name of the client's currency (string, not required, available only for pro workspaces)

name.description: The name of the project (string, required, unique for client and workspace)

wid.description: workspace ID, where the project will be saved (integer, required)

active.description: whether the project is archived or not (boolean, by default true)

is_private.description: whether project is accessible for only project users or for all workspace users (boolean, default true)

template.description: whether the project can be used as a template (boolean, not required)

template_id.description: id of the template project used on current project's creation

billable.description: whether the project is billable or not (boolean, default true, available only for pro workspaces)

active.description: possible values true/false/both. By default true. If false, only archived projects are returned.

name.description: The name of the project (string, required, unique for client and workspace)

wid.description: workspace ID, where the project will be saved (integer, required)

active.description: whether the project is archived or not (boolean, by default true)

is_private.description: whether project is accessible for only project users or for all workspace users (boolean, default true)

template.description: whether the project can be used as a template (boolean, not required)

template_id.description: id of the template project used on current project's creation

billable.description: whether the project is billable or not (boolean, default true, available only for pro workspaces)

uid.description: user ID, who is added to the project (integer, required)

wid.description: workspace ID, where the project belongs to (integer, not-required, project's workspace id is used)

manager.description: admin rights for this project (boolean, default false)

rate.description: hourly rate for the project user (float, not-required, only for pro workspaces) in the currency of the project's client or in workspace default currency.

name.description: The name of the tag (string, required, unique in workspace)

wid.description: workspace ID, where the tag will be used (integer, required). Workspace id (wid) can't be changed.

name.description: The name of the task (string, required, unique in project)

pid.description: project ID for the task (integer, required)

wid.description: workspace ID, where the task will be saved (integer, project's workspace id is used when not supplied)

uid.description: user ID, to whom the task is assigned to (integer, not required)

estimated_seconds.description: estimated duration of task in seconds (integer, not required)

active.description: whether the task is done or not (boolean, by default true)

name.description: The name of the task (string, required, unique in project)

pid.description: project ID for the task (integer, required). Project id (pid) can't be changed on update.

wid.description: workspace ID (integer, required if pid or tid not supplied)

billable.description: (boolean, not required, default false, available for pro workspaces)

created_with.description: the name of your client app (string, required)

tags.description: a list of tag names (array of strings, not required)

duronly.description: should Toggl show the start and stop time of this time entry? (boolean, not required)

start.description: start of time entry (string, required, ISO 8601 date and time)

GetTimeEntries.summary: Get time entries started in a specific time range.If start_date and end_date are not specified, time entries started during the last 9 days are returned.

start_date.description: Start date (must be ISO 8601 date and time string)

end_date.description: End date (must be ISO 8601 date and time string)

email.description: a valid email for the user whose account is created (string, required)

password.description: password at least 6 characters long (string, required)

active.description: possible values true/false/both. By default true. If false, only archived projects are returned.
possible values true/false/both. By default true. If false, only done tasks are returned.
